allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Python script to create A4-sized versions of plots

- create_a4_versions.py: Script to embed original plots in A4 PDFs
- Uses pikepdf to maintain vectorized format without rasterization
- Scales plots to fit A4 \(8.27 x 11.69 inches\) with 0.5 inch margins
- Maintains aspect ratio and centers content on page
- Generated A4 versions: figure_1_A4.pdf, figure_2_A4.pdf, figure_S1_stomata_width_A4.pdf

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
